ID: C74O7Y8_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-02 10:07
Subject: Scheduled Maintenance for AIA and WM9 - 05/04/2025
--------------------------------------------------
 



Dear Colleague, 

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA.

 

Maintenance start time: Saturday, April 05, 2025, | 10:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Saturday, April 05, 2025, | 11:59 PM GST

 

Please be aware that during this period, access to Warehouse Application(WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.


We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.

 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting OneReach <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> .

Click here for more details: Chalhoub Technology  <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> & Data  <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> Service Status <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Chalhoub Technology & Data Status Page <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>
